detail_desc: High-waisted jersey leggings with concealed elastication at the waist.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with crossover straps at the front and lightly padded, moulded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem, and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chinos in premium cotton twill with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Cap in printed cotton jersey with a sweatband inside and concealed elastication at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wrapover blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the neckline, long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs, and smocking at the hem.
Calf-length coat in Italian wool with notch lapels and a one-button fastening at the front. Concealed front pockets and a high-cut single back vent. Lined.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders with reverse seams and a roll edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué on the front and mesh back with an adjustable plastic fastener.
Double-layered headband in a soft, chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, gathered cups and ties at the back and at the back of the neck.
Four metal ear cuffs and two ear cuffs with pearly plastic beads.
Plastic bucket with a handle at the top.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with lace panels down the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, one open back pocket, one back pocket with a button, and long, straight legs.

Padded ski mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, and elastication and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Long dress in airy georgette made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a tiered skirt for added volume and soft draping. Lined in chiffon made from recycled polyester.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs. Wide, elasticated waistband for best fit over the tummy.
Slip-on canvas trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short jacket in an airy, patterned weave with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No fasteners.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, pile-lined hood and zip with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hat in a printed weave with reflective details, a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Lining in faux fur and fleece.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves. Wide, sewn-in tie belt under the bust at the front, smocking at the back of the waist, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey in a straight cut with high slits in the sides.
Cardigan in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with an ombre effect. Round neckline with a small opening at the front and covered button at the top, and short sleeves. Vertical seam down the front and back and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short, fitted, rib-knit top with a deep V-neck, zip at the top and short sleeves.
Multi-strand necklace covered in patterned plastic stones. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and a drawstring at the waist.
Chinos in twill made from a cotton blend with a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to hem. Ribbed hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined velour with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Jersey lining.
Bra tops in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with elastic hems. Jersey lining.
Brazilian briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high cut at the back and high-cut legs.
Thin metal necklace with a pendant in the shape of a ring with sparkly stones. Adjustable length 41-47 cm.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in a soft modal weave with flounces at the top and on the sleeves. Straight-cut style with overlocked edges.

Sleeveless jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Fastening with a concealed press-stud at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with a hood and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Joggers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend. High, drawstring waist with covered elastication, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a press-stud and tapered legs with elasticated hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Scarf in a soft, textured knit. Size 50x170 cm.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck front and back and wide shoulder straps. Medium support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jacket in wide wale corduroy made from a cotton blend with a pile-lined collar and buttons down the front. Handwarmer pockets and flap front pockets with a button. Pile lining.
Fabric-covered plastic Alice bands with a bow on top.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with short sleeves.
Kangol x H&M. Short turtleneck top in a soft rib knit with an embroidered Kangol logo at the top and long sleeves.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 9M-4Y) and ribbed hems.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a fake fly. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short A-line skirt in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch front pockets. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Set with a hair doughnut and three hair pins, two with glittery antlers and one with a pompom on the top.
Top in nepped sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, print motifs on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
